name: Grounded! (ajur)
description:
You’re reasonable teenager, whose friends convinced to throw a house party while your parents are gone for the night.
As usually, things started to go out of control - unknown people started co came by, while litter and broken stuff pops up with increasing rate.
All this time, being good host, you try to clean up and resolve as may issues as possible, before things go over the top and someone calls your parents to go back. Tbh, it’s inevitable, only question is, how long can you keep the party going? :D

This is my entry in LudumDare50 Extra format. Hope you enjoy it playing as much as I enjoyed making it :)

Steering:
- Keyboard: wasd or cursors
- mouse / touch - by default virtual thumbstick, but can be changed to "follow pointer" in menu.
